## NodeStats interface

An interface for node statistics.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NodeStats 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./workflow.nodestats.id.md) |  | [NodeId](./workflow.nodeid.md) | The unique identifier for this node |
|  [recalculationCauses](./workflow.nodestats.recalculationcauses.md) |  | Record&lt;string, number&gt; | Specific causes of recalculations |
|  [recalculations](./workflow.nodestats.recalculations.md) |  | number | The number of times this node has been recalculated |
|  [version](./workflow.nodestats.version.md) |  | number | The number of times this node's value has changed |
